languages.text: "Разве мы не говорили уже об этом? Я останусь рядом с тобой — больше никто не посмеет решать мою судьбу за меня". {n}На лице Хейнрикса появляется усмешка.{/n} "А чтобы я не размяк от безделья, я найду себе подходящее дело под твоим руководством. Найдется ли в твоем офицерском экипаже достойное занятие для бывшего инквизиторского дознавателя? У меня уже есть пара идей".

"Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."
languages.original_text: "Разве мы не говорили уже об этом? Я останусь рядом с тобой — больше никто не посмеет решать мою судьбу за меня". {n}На лице Хейнрикса появляется усмешка.{/n} "А чтобы я не размяк от безделья, я найду себе подходящее дело под твоим руководством. Найдется ли в твоем офицерском экипаже достойное занятие для бывшего инквизиторского дознавателя? У меня уже есть пара идей".

Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

"Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

"Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

"Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

languages.text: 「この話はもう終わったでしょう？我はお側にい続ける。我の運命を決めるのは、他の誰でもなく、我自身です」{n}ハインリックスは微笑んだ。{/n}「そして暇つぶしとして、御身の指揮の下、何か別のことに専念しましょう。元異端審問官のインテロゲイターにふさわしい仕事は余っていませんか？いろいろと役に立てると思いますよ」
languages.original_text: "Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

traits.locale_text: 「この話はもう終わったでしょう？我はお側にい続ける。我の運命を決めるのは、他の誰でもなく、我自身です」{n}ハインリックスは微笑んだ。{/n}「そして暇つぶしとして、御身の指揮の下、何か別のことに専念しましょう。元異端審問官のインテロゲイターにふさわしい仕事は余っていませんか？いろいろと役に立てると思いますよ」

languages.text: “我们不是已经讨论过了吗？我会继续留在你身边——谁也无法替我决定我的命运。”{n}海因里希露出了笑容。{/n}“为了避免穷极无聊，我会在你的领导下找到一份合适的工作。在你的军官队伍里，有什么适合前任审讯官的位置吗？关于这个问题，我已经有了些想法。”
languages.original_text: "Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

traits.locale_text: “我们不是已经讨论过了吗？我会继续留在你身边——谁也无法替我决定我的命运。”{n}海因里希露出了笑容。{/n}“为了避免穷极无聊，我会在你的领导下找到一份合适的工作。在你的军官队伍里，有什么适合前任审讯官的位置吗？关于这个问题，我已经有了些想法。”

languages.text: "Haben wir nicht schon darüber gesprochen? Ich bleibe an Eurer Seite — niemand sonst wird es wagen, mein Schicksal für mich zu entscheiden." {n}Ein Grinsen erblüht auf Heinrix' Gesicht.{/n} "Und um mich vor der Untätigkeit zu retten, werde ich mir etwas Würdiges zu tun suchen, unter Eurer Führung. Gibt es in Eurem Offizierskorps einen Beruf, der eines ehemaligen Interrogators der Inquisitor würdig ist? Ich hätte da schon einige Ideen."
languages.original_text: "Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

traits.locale_text: "Haben wir nicht schon darüber gesprochen? Ich bleibe an Eurer Seite — niemand sonst wird es wagen, mein Schicksal für mich zu entscheiden." {n}Ein Grinsen erblüht auf Heinrix' Gesicht.{/n} "Und um mich vor der Untätigkeit zu retten, werde ich mir etwas Würdiges zu tun suchen, unter Eurer Führung. Gibt es in Eurem Offizierskorps einen Beruf, der eines ehemaligen Interrogators der Inquisitor würdig ist? Ich hätte da schon einige Ideen."

languages.text: «Ya lo habíamos hablado, ¿no? Permaneceré a su lado. El único que decide mi destino soy yo». {n}Heinrix sonríe abiertamente.{/n} «Y, para evitarme la tentación de la holgazanería, encontraré algo adecuado que hacer bajo su mando. ¿Tiene algún puesto que pueda ocupar un antiguo Interrogador de la Inquisición? Yo tengo un par de propuestas».
languages.original_text: "Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

traits.locale_text: «Ya lo habíamos hablado, ¿no? Permaneceré a su lado. El único que decide mi destino soy yo». {n}Heinrix sonríe abiertamente.{/n} «Y, para evitarme la tentación de la holgazanería, encontraré algo adecuado que hacer bajo su mando. ¿Tiene algún puesto que pueda ocupar un antiguo Interrogador de la Inquisición? Yo tengo un par de propuestas».

languages.text: « N'avons-nous pas déjà abordé cette question ? Je resterai à vos côtés ; nul n'osera décider de mon destin à ma place. Et pour me sauver du désœuvrement, {n}continue-t-il en souriant,{/n} je trouverai quelque chose d'utile à faire sous votre commandement. Votre corps d'officier aurait-il quelques tâches dignes d'un ancien interrogateur inquisitorial ? J'ai déjà quelques idées en tête. »
languages.original_text: "Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."

traits.locale_text: « N'avons-nous pas déjà abordé cette question ? Je resterai à vos côtés ; nul n'osera décider de mon destin à ma place. Et pour me sauver du désœuvrement, {n}continue-t-il en souriant,{/n} je trouverai quelque chose d'utile à faire sous votre commandement. Votre corps d'officier aurait-il quelques tâches dignes d'un ancien interrogateur inquisitorial ? J'ai déjà quelques idées en tête. »

languages.text: "Bunu zaten konuşmamış mıydık? Yanında kalacağım. Kaderimi benden başkası tayin edemeyecek." {n}Heinrix'in yüzüne bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n} "Sonra da canımın sıkılmasını engellemek için senin liderliğinde kendime yapacak uygun bir şeyler bulacağım. Subay kademelerinde eski bir Engizisyon Sorgucusu'na uygun bir vazife var mı? Aklıma birkaç fikir geldi bile."
languages.original_text: "Haven't we already talked about this? I'll remain by your side — no one else will dare decide my fate for me." {n}A grin dawns on Heinrix's face.{/n} "And to save me from idleness, I'll find something suitable to do under your leadership. Is there any occupation worthy of a former Inquisitorial Interrogator in your officer corps? I already have a few ideas of my own."
